rooms.description: Large entrance hall with traditional Kerala-style motifs, incorporating local stone and woodwork.
Open-plan living area merging with the kitchen. Natural light through large windows and ventilation corridors in keeping with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Open concept kitchen integrated into the living area, featuring natural stone countertops and a ventilated layout to promote fresh air circulation.
Spacious master bedroom with east-facing windows for optimal sunlight in accordance with Vastu guidelines. Includes a walk-in closet.
Well-appointed secondary bedroom designed with ample natural light and ventilation, ensuring a calm living environment.
Modern bathroom with integrated fixtures. Designed for privacy while maintaining the traditional Kerala aesthetic.
Dedicated gym area with natural light and ventilation, designed to be an inviting space for physical exercise without compromising the farmhouse vibe.

openings.description: Traditional wooden entrance door with intricate carvings reflecting Kerala craftsmanship.
Large windows to enhance natural light and ventilation in the living area as per Vastu principles.
Functional windows to ensure ventilation and light in the kitchen area.
Balcony door with access to an outdoor space providing fresh air and natural light in line with Vastu guidelines.
